remarks: Scalar product operation for the constructed full vector space H. (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-2013.)
statement:
dvhfvsca.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhfvsca.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfvsca.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfvsca.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfvsca.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
dvhvsca $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ ( R e. E /\ F e. ( T X. E ) ) ) -> ( R .x. F ) = <. ( R ` ( 1st ` F ) ) , ( R o. ( 2nd ` F ) ) >. ) $.
